Class LayoutPreviewPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              LayoutPreviewPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class LayoutPreviewPanel
extends javax.swing.JComponent

A simple graph viewer component that can be used to visualize instances of LayoutGraph. This class is meant as a debugging aid for developers that do not have the viewer classes of the yFiles Viewer distribution.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getGraph

public y.layout.LayoutGraph getGraph()
Returns the LayoutGraph instance displayed by this view.

update

public void update()
Updates the contents of this view. This includes invoking the set layout algorithm on the graph and adjusting the zoom and clip of the view.

paintComponent

public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
Paint this component. This will paint the associated LayoutGraph.
